Name should by unique within this data source.
Name should contain minimum of 3 characters and maximum of 64 characters
Target should be a valid IP address

CLI is Command Line Interface. It can be used to fetch Interface Health, Device Health and other resource information from various devices. vuSmartMaps support both 'ssh' and 'telnet'.

Credentials

Configure your ssh or telnet Credentials in 'Settings' -> 'Credentials' tab. vuSmartMaps can intelligently figure out which credential to use if multiple credentials are configured.

Device configurations

Configure the remote device to allow ssh or telnet access from vuSmartMaps shipper server. If its a security device like Firewall, you may need to configure a ACL to allow ssh or telnet access for this.

Verify if data has been received from this data source. Data from this data source will be indexed and ready for your use.
